pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Shopcloud SecretHub CLIThe SecretHub CLI provides the command-line interface to interact with the SecretHub API.## install```$ pip install shopcloud_secrethub```### Usage__Reading and writing secrets:__```sh$ secrethub auth$ secrethub read <secret-name>$ secrethub write <secret-name> <value>```__Provisioning your applications with secrets:__Provision a template file```sh$ secrethub inject -i app.temp.yaml -o app.yaml# app.temp.yamlenv_variables: ENV: {{ talk-point/test-repo/env }} SECRET_KEY: {{ talk-point/test-repo/secret_key }}```Provision to the environment```sh$ eval `secrethub printenv -i app.temp.yaml`# app.temp.yamlenv_variables: ENV: {{ talk-point/test-repo/env }} SECRET_KEY: {{ talk-point/test-repo/secret_key }}```__in Code:__```pyfrom shopcloud_secrethub import SecretHubhub = SecretHub(user_app="test-script", api_token='<TOKEN>')hub.read('talk-point/test-repo/secret_key')```### Deploy to PyPi```sh$ rm -rf build dist$ pip3 install wheel twine$ python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel$ twine upload dist/*```
